str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kata and leipo; to leave down, i.e. Behind; by implication, to abandon, have remaining.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Fine linen, a linen cloth. Of uncertain origin; byssos, i.e. Bleached linen.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To flee, escape, shun. Apparently a primary verb; to run away; by implication, to shun; by analogy, to vanish.
Rarely: stark-naked; generally: wearing only the under-garment; bare, open, manifest; mere. Of uncertain affinity; nude.
